Feats-Skill-Society -- Female Half-Elf Bard: 2
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 0; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Connections; Cooperative Nature; Courtly Graces; Legendary Codebreaker; Legendary Linguist; Multifarious Muse (Enigma); Multilingual; Reach Spell; Read Lips; Sign Language; Streetwise Bard Features: Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Longsword; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Whip; Unarmed Attacks); Bard Feats; Bard Skills; Composition Spells; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Muses; Occult Spellcasting; Perception Expert; Polymath; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Skill Feats; Spell Trained (Occult) Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Bard Feats: 1 selections
Enigma: Has the Bardic Lore feature
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Multifarious Muse (Enigma): Has the Enigma feature/+1 Class Feat
Muses: 1 selection
Polymath: Has the Versatile Performance feature
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Multifarious Muse (Enigma): May learn enigma muse feats
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +6 (charisma; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Folktale Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Athletics: +5 (strength; trained) Herbalism Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Bardic Lore: +8 (intelligence; expert) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +8 (intelligence; expert)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Demon Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +6 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Languages: Abyssal; Celestial; Common; Draconic; Elven; Goblin
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Bardic Lore: May use Bardic Lore to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Connections: May use Society to gain a meeting with an important figure or to exchange favors
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Courtly Graces: May use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make an Impression on one
Legendary Codebreaker: May use Society to Decipher Writing at full Speed; successes at normal Speed are critical successes
Legendary Linguist: May establish basic communication with any creature that uses language
Read Lips: May read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and flat-footed
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: May use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: May use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation
Combat
Hit Points: 28 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; trained); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 5; O1: 3 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 16 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' radius may substitute caster Performance roll for save
Inspire Courage (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
True Strike (O1 Div): (1) Next caster Strike in same turn uses the better of two rolls, ignores concealed or hidden, and ignores circumstance penalties
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point/Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage spells
Enigma: Knows the True Strike spell
Occult Spellcasting: May learn spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant spell
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
Legendary Codebreaker Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and society rank (currently 2) >= 4
Legendary Linguist Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15, society rank (currently 2) >= 4 and multilingual feature (currently 1)
